title: Putumayo presents: New Orleans (2005)
description:
Ã¢â‚¬Å“Putumayo presents: New OrleansÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ (2005) provides a nice introduction and a pretty good mix of the classic and the contemporary. The music remains, despite its era or performer, fully of the New Orleans style.

Household names like Louis Prima, Louis Armstrong and Dr. John do their version of some Crescent City classics. Local favorites like trumpeter Kermit Ruffins, Preservation Hall Jazz Band and singer Topsy Chapman offer up traditional flavor as well.

Highlighting a vibrant diversity of old and new talent, this album is a musical and cultural tour of New Orleans.


Various Artists

Putumayo presents: New Orleans

2005


  CD / 2005 / 320Kbps

9. Give It Up (Gypsy Second Line) - Dr. Michael White
 	   
10. Going Back To New Orleans - Deacon John
 	   
11. Bye & Bye/Saints - Greg Stafford 


Various Artists / Putumayo presents: New Orleans / 2005
